original_text: On that day, the Lord himself will come down from heaven. He will shout with authority. People will hear the voice of the leader of God's angels. They will hear the sound of God's trumpet. Then those people who have died as Christians will become alive again. They will be the first people to rise up.
korean_text: 주께서 호령과 천사장의 소리와 하나님의 나팔 소리로 친히 하늘로부터 강림하시리니 그리스도 안에서 죽은 자들이 먼저 일어나고

sentences.original_text: the Lord himself will come down from heaven
People will hear the voice of the leader of God's angels
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들은 하나님의 천사장의 소리를 들을 것이다

sentences.original_text: They will hear the sound of God's trumpet
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 하나님의 나팔 소리를 들을 것이다

sentences.original_text: Then those people who have died as Christians
They will be the first people to rise up
